autonomy.description: Believing that one's blessings are due to one's own self-sufficiency and determination is a sin as it is a rejection of recognizing Divine Providence as being ultimately responsible.

envy.question: Have I felt jealous when witnessing others' achievements or acquiring something I feel they don't have?
envy.description: Envy leads us to have discontent for another's possessions so we won't feel the pain of comparison or perceived lack in our own lives.

envy.question: Have I secretly wished that my peers' success in their careers would hinder theirs, so I wouldn't feel inferior by comparison?
envy.description: Envy leads us to have discontent for another's possessions so we won't feel the pain of comparison or perceived lack in our own lives.

extracted_data_phrases: through online platforms or social media
incontinence.question: Did I lack self-control when speaking to others through online platforms or social media, using language that was vulgar or inappropriate?
incontinence.description: This sin of incontinence shows a lack of self-restraint and violates the dignity of others.

incontinence.description: This sin of incontinence shows a lack of self-restraint and violates the dignity of others.

incontinence.description: This sin of incontinence shows a lack of self-restraint and violates the dignity of others.

gluttony.question: Did I overindulge in eating or drinking beyond what's reasonable, perhaps while trying new recipes or cooking for others?
gluttony.description: This sin of gluttony demonstrates an inordinate attachment to worldly pleasures and rejects the call to temperance.

gluttony.question: Did you overindulge in eating or drinking, failing to use self-control and moderation?

extracted_data_phrases: over responsible stewardship of my family 's needs
prodigality.question: Have I excessively risked financial resources entrusted to me, prioritizing frivolous pursuits over responsible stewardship of my family's needs?
prodigality.description: This sin violates the virtue of stewardship by recklessly risking resources God has entrusted to us, while potentially harming our ability to provide for family and those in need.

prodigality.question: Have I excessively indulged in gambling to take precedence over my family's needs, thereby neglecting my responsibilities towards them?
prodigality.description: This sin violates the virtue of stewardship by recklessly risking resources God has entrusted to us, while potentially harming our ability to provide for family and those in need.

gossip.question: Have I taken pleasure in discussing others' private affairs, even if what I shared was true?
gossip.description: Gossip violates human dignity and charity by harming others' reputations for our own entertainment or pride.

impiety.question: Did I work on a Sunday for purposes that could have been avoided, thereby diminishing its sanctity?
impiety.description: It's irreverent to work on a Sunday as it's a holy day of rest, worship, and a day of protest against the servitude of work and the worship of money (CCC).

impurity.question: Have I used practices, substances, or objects to prevent pregnancy?
impurity.description: This sin intentionally separates the unitive and procreative purposes of marriage and violates the proper use of one's sexuality.
